title: Unstable ping for no reason
body:
I'm getting very unstable ping (47 to 400 every 2 second) and it's unplayable, I was wondering if anyone else was getting the lag. Its not my wifi, I did every damn solutions on internet and still lagging. If someone could help it would be great.

Editing my edit: I just changed router, 0% packet loss, im on laptop and im suspecting my wireless adapter to make me lag. My ethernet cable works fine

replies.body:
I see in your edit you mention 8% packet loss. This can definitely cause a ton of issues in League, as each packet is crucial in communicating both your actions and movements, as well as your client receiving and displaying each other player's actions and movements. While there are a number of potential causes, our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) goes over some great first steps in resolving your packet loss. 

Let me know if you continue to still see issues after following that guide.
I'm suspecting my wireless adapter on laptop to make me lag. My ethernet cable works just fine. Gonna try to repair it. Thank you tho
my pc has this problem since wednesday, but my mac works just fine, dont know why

So the problem is the computer, not league?

If the problem is my laptop then im not going to play league anymore, I bought a $1500 asus one...
